What is Switch, and what is its purpose on the Verus network?

Switch is a decentralized currency that is fully backed by VRSC, DAI, USDC, and EURC. Its primary purpose is to serve as a gateway currency, allowing users to switch between Verus and different stablecoins. Additionally, users can hold Switch, which accrues value from conversion fees.

Title: Introducing Switch — The Gateway to Switch Between Stablecoins on Verus
